name: Finding Oscar
description:
Find your dog in the afterlife.

Use the A and D keys to move.
This game is very short and can be completed in one sitting.

Game created by RatsInWalls (and a few tools).
This is my first game I developed and published.
Resulted in me getting back pain, overused wrist, and a messed up sleep schedule.

If you have any problems running this game. Please leave a comment.

Created for the B&W Jam #9
